programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond The Lobby S1
programme.desc: In the third episode of this eye-opening series, Giles Coren and Monica Galetti discover Giraffe Manor, a unique hotel where giraffes, staff and guests all coexist in a 1930s Scottish-style hunting lodge on the edge of Nairobi National Park. It is the operational headquarters of Tanya and Mikey Carr-Hartley, fourth-generation Kenyans who also own three satellite luxury lodges and camps throughout Kenya and east Africa's wilderness.

programme.title: MasterChef Singapore S3
programme.desc: Sleepy contestants are awoken at 5am. After dragging themselves to the MasterChef Kitchen, the reason for the early start is revealed: each to cook a brunch dish which stars coffee. Each Nespresso Vertuo flavour is assigned a specific cooking method decided by Guest Chef LG Han. The Bottom 4 then face elimination in one of the most frantic challenges - Keeping up with the Chef. Contestants must re-create Guest Chef Petrina Loh's dish solely by watching and trying to keep up.

programme.title: Expedition With Steve Backshall S1
programme.desc: In this truly global series, three-time BAFTA-winning adventurer and wildlife expert, Steve Backshall ventures into uncharted territory in pursuit of new discoveries and world firsts. On 10 unique journeys, Steve scales unclimbed peaks, uncovers life unknown to science, meets local people and shines light into caves that have been dark for millions of years. Shot in stunning 4K, this is a beautifully filmed journey into the unknown.

programme.title: 5 Gold Rings S4
programme.desc: In 5 Gold Rings, every pixel counts! Hosted by Phillip Schofield.

programme.title: A Year On Planet Earth
programme.desc: Filmed in over 60 different locations this epic documentary series will draw on the most spellbinding and dramatic stories from all corners of the globe. It will reveal the ways all life is connected and how natural events affect animals.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond The Lobby S1

programme.title: Beyblade Burst Rise [S4]
programme.desc: Legendary Blader Valt Aoi has been training the next generation of elite Bladers at Spain's BC Sol. One day, rookie Bladers Dante Koryu and Delta Zakuro witness Valt unleashing his newly evolved Gamma Bey, Sword Valtryek. To their surprise, Valtryek radiates a golden light as it rockets around the stadium. Inspired by the limitless possibilities of this Hyper-Flux state, both Dante and Delta seek the same bond with their Beys.

programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus S4
programme.desc: Because Duri is so busy having fun during his summer break he doesn't have enough time to do any of his homework, so he asks Tayo for help. Tayo is too busy to help so he asks Rogi to help Duri. Rogi tries his best but ends up making a mess of everything. Duri is very disappointed. He tells Rogi that Tayo would have done a much better job. This inspires Rogi to work much harder and fix all the mistakes he made.

programme.desc: Billy has trouble colouring well and isn't confident about his colouring skills. When the children discover that they have to colour a colourless rainbow in the Big Garden, Billy has to learn to be more confident in his ability. The hands on the clock in the Big Garden have gone missing! Paula and her friends need to work together to find the culprit and learn to tell the time on a clock.

programme.title: The Wall UK S4
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: 阿贤乡镇食旅
programme.desc: 浮罗山背（Balik Pulau）是尚未被文明染指的一块璞玉，背山面海捞得到虾蟹渔获，种得出丁香豆蔻榴梿，是谁的美意把浮罗山背点缀成犹如一座世外桃源？浮罗新路头河口上的炸河粉，河粉炸成中空蓬松含了空气，芡汁勾上当地渔民新鲜打捞上来的海虾形成绝配，河粉的口感既酥脆又松软，「一口两吃」；若然时来运到，还能品尝在地野生螃蟹炒米粉，在粉食中吃到绵密蟹黄！想要「一面三味」就得来上一碗阿庇面，有卤汁有咖喱又有如假包换的「虾汤」鲜味，且配料也未免太过份了，米粉面条铺上叉烧、鱼饼还有猪血画龙点睛；阿庇面是全马唯一，浮罗山.

programme.title: 华文“浆”好玩 S3

programme.title: 星期二特写 ：务必效劳
programme.desc: (重) 有的人自小被领养，会质疑“为什么亲生父母不要我？”有的家人遇害，嫌凶在逃，他们到临终还惦念凶手是谁？天理何在？民间义务组织新加坡罪案图书馆致力帮助这些人追寻真相，不断呼吁知情者提供线索，转交警方或委托者，以求了结。要四处奔走采集网络播报的内容，又要面对无尽的冤屈无奈，为何他们能持续耕耘21年？.

programme.title: 都市狂想
programme.desc: (PG)(重) 离婚率居高不下，市政府实施结婚考照措施，市民需像开车一样考取执照，确保在婚前已理解婚姻的责任和义务。结婚执照分3至5级，级别越高越难考，代表考照人的条件越优越，可获得市政府给予夫妻的津贴也更高。持不婚主义的广告创意总监Eason，遇见让他难以忘怀的冷傲女神Claire。但Claire只跟有5级婚照的男人约会。Eason只好去考照，自信满满的他在开始模拟课程后才发现考照非常难！Eason去按摩中心放松时巧遇乔装按摩师以按摩出力来纾压的Claire…….

programme.title: 锦心似玉

programme.title: ila 部落住一晚 S2
programme.desc: 真正的旅行是沿途风景，是享受寂静是探索寻宝。张克帆夫妻说: 桃源区宝山里什么都有了。夫妻俩从宝山三宝-爱玉,咖啡,茶。他们发现这些饮品在族人生命中占有的份量，间接感受到族人对土地的热爱与付出，谚语山不在高有仙则灵,宝山风景优美,因族人的生活更美了......喝下宝山部落的集顶山咖啡，会体悟不可预测的人生，电影阿甘说:人生有如一盒巧克力，你永远不知道将尝到哪种口味，宝山咖啡的APIN CINA却说，人生有如咖啡豆，种下去会适应温度土地，没想到越恶劣的环境，只要能活下去，就会越长越好。CNIA嫁到平地二十多年.
